items.title: How Amazon’s Nuclear Deal Could Solve a Touchy Political Problem
items.description: The data-center agreement with Talen Energy could help ease fears of rising electricity prices for homeowners.

items.title: Vinson & Elkins Represents Talen Energy in Agreement to Power Amazon Data Centers
items.description: By Karen Roman Vinson & Elkins said Partner Kaam Sahely is leading the firm’s team to represent Talen Energy Corp. (Nasdaq: TLN) in the expansion of its nuclear relationship with Amazon.com, Inc. (Nasdaq: AMZN). The agreement will allow Talen to supply carbon-free energy from its Susquehanna nuclear power plant to Amazon Web Services (AWS) data […]
